record.id: field.name="allow.many" and file.name="validity" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: allow.many
record.file.name: validity

brief.brief: Determines whether to allow a query to return many records.
This field controls the action taken the Val query retrieves many (more than one) records.
If this field is false and more than one record returns, the user must select one of the records from the list or run the Lkup Query.
When the user selects a record from the list, system copies the fields in the lookup record to the record it is validating, following the definitions in the Fields to Copy section.
If this field is true and more than one record returns, then the field is considered valid; however, Service Manager does not copy any fields to the record it is validating.
